column4: how would this be done if the only access is via live disk is there an easy way to fix these things running from a live disk??? just as a currious side note
ive never used a livecd but some things can be fixed but the hdd must be mounted because youre running off the cd not the hdd. unless your using gparted or something.
what are you trying to fix?
boot to recovery mode to fix most things
